Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People on social media have a lot to say about the upcoming Australian Federal Budget. There's a call to increase jobseeker payments as the Australian government is accused of ignoring expert advice. The Labor party's reported decision not to increase jobseeker payments has drawn criticism. Meanwhile concerns about fiscal responsibility were raised around the implementation of Stage 3 tax cuts which are expected to add over $240 billion to the budget. The budget demands weighing heavily on the government include increasing participation of women in the workforce and providing additional welfare support. Additionally there have been calls to address the issue of homelessness among young people. Finally GPs are calling for changes to make health cover more affordable.
